Hi group

I'm trying to write a script which largely automates the
download=
/configureation/build/installation of Cantera on the
institutes computers (=
some of the people here are not very fluent in
installing things on linux).=


A problem I encountered is, that the configure script always tries to
bui=
ld the F90 interface, no matter what value BUILD_F90_INTERFACE has.
I track=
ed it down into the config/configure script, where the
BUILD_F90 variable i=
s assigned correctly 0 or 1. But then, further on,
the latter variable is u=
sed in an if statement with test -n:

if test -n ${BUILD_F90}; then

which =
will always result in true. If I'm not mistaken, it should read

if [ $BUIL=
D_F90 =3D 1 ]; then


This concerns the source package of version 1.6.0.


=
Michael
